title: Protest in Brussels against China’s treatment of the Uyghurs

title_detail.value: Protest in Brussels against China’s treatment of the Uyghurs

summary: Around 100 people gathered outside the Chinese Embassy in Brussels on Saturday to protest against China's treatment of the Uyghurs a Turkish-speaking people that live in the Xinjiang Uyghur region in north-western China.

summary_detail.value: Around 100 people gathered outside the Chinese Embassy in Brussels on Saturday to protest against China's treatment of the Uyghurs a Turkish-speaking people that live in the Xinjiang Uyghur region in north-western China.
